UI_setting_disableWithDefault_text: Disable for vehicles with default camouflage
UI_setting_disableWithDefault_tooltip: If enabled, mod will ignore vehicles with a default camouflage.
UI_setting_doRandom_tooltip: If enabled, mod will select a random available camouflage if no other option is provided.
UI_setting_fillEmptySlots_tooltip: Add random camouflages if a vehicle has empty slots for them.
UI_setting_fullAlpha_tooltip:
If enabled, all custom camouflages lose their transparency.
Some call this "dirt-less skins".
UI_setting_hangarCamoKind_tooltip: This setting controls the season which is used in hangar.
UI_setting_uniformOutfit_tooltip: Random camouflages are picked up so that a vehicle has the same camouflage on all parts (if possible).
UI_setting_useBought_tooltip: If enabled, mod will preserve bought camouflages on other players' tanks.
flashCol_freeVersion_message:
You are using the free version.
Install mode is only capable of installing items added into the game using config files
and elements available for purchase for current vehicle.
Paid Patreon/Boosty subscribers have access to the extended version,
which is able to install ANY customization elements for free.
flashCol_freeVersion_tooltip:
Install mode is only capable of installing items added into the game using config files
and elements available for purchase for current vehicle.
flashCol_progressionDecal_changeMode_mes:
Current style can not be edited.
If you proceed, you will be moved to custom mode's decal tab.
Do you want to continue?
flashCol_wrongVersion_message: Incompatible game version detected: %(version)s build %(build)s. Modified functionality was disabled to prevent game malfunction. Please, report the fact of this message appearing in the comments under the Patreon/Boosty post where you downloaded the mod from. Don't forget to include the version and the build number listed above!
